titleStmt.title: A Collection of the several late petitions &c. to the Honourable House with an addition never before printed of a preface and a catalogue of above forty petitions ordered to be drawn up and presented to the Honourable House at their next sessions.

notesStmt.note: "Viz., I. The ladies petition, II. The batchellors remonstrance, III. The chaplains petition, IV. The poets proposal, V. The widows petition, VI. An act, drawn up by a committee, of grievances."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
